subSections.title: Software Engineer, Technical Architect
subSections.body: Software Engineer with tech industry experience in many roles including: developer, technical architect, project manager, analyst, tester, I am now focusing my career in the Software Engineering.

subSections.title: Software Engineer, Technical Architect
subSections.body:
Responsible for all CoMotionâ€™s IT hardware, systems, and support. Managed development team and external contractors in fulfilling new feature requests and bug fixes.

  • Implemented: Project Management System using Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS). Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment from VSTS to on premise systems, Customized SharePoint Intranet. Mentor Matching System using Chronus.
  • Architected: Online form for users to interact with the CoMotion Office using Angular front end, a C# webservice backend, and a C# client for processing and reviewing submittals before transferring to official backend. Designed, Developed, and modified Angular UI, C# webservice.
  • Development: Created, Maintained, and Enhanced C# webservice, C# Windows Forms, Angular Application, SQL-CLR functions, and Ruby and Rails solutions. Defined Development standards and frameworks for new applications.
